Loading.error: An error occured while loading the data. Please try again later.

confirm-deletion.description: This action will delete your transactions in the Cozy Banks app along with the links set up with your bills. You can delete your bank account in #{LINK}the Cozy Collect app#{/LINK} if you do not wish to reimport your banking data at the next scheduled synchronization.
confirm-deletion.title: Are you definitive ?

Accounts.no-accounts: You do not have any account yet.
Accounts.no-shared-accounts: You do not have any shared account yet.
Accounts.label: Label

Groups.label: Label
Groups.no-groups: Using groups, you can easily gather several accounts, feel free to create one.

title.empty_text: There is no transaction to analyze on this period

health.title: Automatic tracking of your reimbursements
health.description: Connect your %{brandName} account to your Cozy to automatically fetch your reimbursements.

generic.title: Automatic fetching of my bills
generic.description: Connect your %{brandName} account to your Cozy to automatically fetch your bills.

informativeModal.caption: Your Cozy is totally private: nobody but you can access its content.

weekly_summary.description: You will receive a summary of your expenses and revenues every Monday of every week.
weekly_summary.title: Weekly Synthesis

when_month_revenue.description: You will receive an email at the reception of your salary each month.
when_month_revenue.title: Payment of salary

monthly_summary.description: You will receive a summary of your expenses and income each month.
monthly_summary.title: Monthly summary

if_balance_lower.description: You will receive an email if your balance is less than
if_balance_lower.title: Balance threshold

several.title: %{accountsLength} accounts are below your threshold amount of %{lowerBalance}%{currency}

if_transaction_greater.description: You will receive a notification if a movement is greater than
if_transaction_greater.title: Movement amount

no_revenue.description: You will be notified if you have not received your salary at the %{input} of each month.
no_revenue.title: Salary Delay

when_health_bill_linked.title: Medical expenses coverage
when_health_bill_linked.description: You will be notified when a reimbursement is found for a medical expense. This requires to connect your Cozy to your medical insurance.

ComingSoon.description: These features will soon be available.
ComingSoon.title: To come up

auto_categorization.title: Automatic categorization of your transactions
auto_categorization.subtitle: Help us improve the model by anonymously sharing your categorized transactions. More

AppSettings.description: By clicking Reset, you will be able to start your application over, and will only lose the data saved on your smartphone.

confirmation.title: Reset this application?
confirmation.description: By logging out of your Cozy, you will erase all data synchronized locally by your mobile application.

manage-budget.description: Summary of all your accounts at a glance
manage-budget.title: Control your budget

save-time.description: Your invoices at your fingertips directly from your statements
save-time.title: Save Time

cozy-assistant.description: Automatic follow-up of your medical expenses
cozy-assistant.title: Cozy is working for you

Onboarding.wait-moments: Please wait a few moments if you have just connected a bank. Your data will be displayed automatically !

welcome.no_account_link: Don’t have an account? Request one here.

server_selection.description: This is the web address you use to access your Cozy.
server_selection.wrong_address_with_email: You typed an email address. To connect on your cozy you must type its url, something like https://tonystark.mycozy.cloud
server_selection.wrong_address_v2: You have just entered the address of old Cozy version. This application is only compatible with the latest version. [Please refer to our site for more information.](https://blog.cozycloud.cc/post/2016/11/21/On-the-road-to-Cozy-version-3?lang=en)
server_selection.wrong_address: This address doesn’t seem to be a cozy. Please check the address you provide.
server_selection.wrong_address_cosy: Woops, the address is not correct. Try with "mycozy.cloud" with a "z"!

password.description: You need to choose a strong password. Use numbers, uppercase latters, special characters…

email.description: We will send you an email to confirm the creation of your Cozy.
email.invalid: This doesn't seem to be a valid email address.
email.taken: There's already a Cozy bound to this email address.

instance.description: This is the web address you use to sign it to your Cozy.  It might be a good idea to write it down.
instance.existing: This internet address is already used. Try adding extra characters.
instance.blacklisted: This internet address is not available.
instance.invalid: This internet address is not valid.

revoked.title: Access revoked
revoked.description: It appears you revoked this device from your Cozy. If you didn't, please let us know at contact@cozycloud.cc. All your local data related to your Cozy will be removed.

FileOpener.error: Unable to find the file. It may have been deleted in the Drive application.

updated.title: GDPR comes into reality !
updated.detail: In the context of the General Data Protection Regulation, [our Terms of Service have been updated](%{link}) and will apply to all our Cozy users on May 25, 2018.
updated.error: Something went wrong, please try again later
